summary: This script launches a virtual machine with the QEMU emulator, enabling KVM acceleration and configuring serial output over Telnet. The VM boots from the specified hard disk (c.hd) and uses the provided disk image (-hda).

details.comment: This script launches a virtual machine with the QEMU emulator, enabling KVM acceleration and configuring serial output over Telnet. The VM boots from the specified hard disk (c.hd) and uses the provided disk image (-hda).
